name: Monopoly
description: A classic board game where players buy and sell properties and compete to become the wealthiest player.

name: Clue
description: A murder mystery game where players solve a crime by gathering clues to determine the suspect, weapon, and location.

name: Settlers of Catan
description: A strategy game where players build settlements, cities, and roads on an island called Catan.

name: Risk
description: A game of global domination where players engage in battles to conquer territories and eliminate their opponents.

name: Scrabble
description: A word game where players compete to create words using letter tiles and earn points based on the length and complexity of their words.

name: Chess
description: A two-player strategy board game played on a checkered gameboard.

name: Checkers
description: A two-player strategy board game played on a checkered gameboard.

name: Ticket to Ride
description: A railway-themed German-style board game.

name: Carcassonne
description: A tile-based German-style board game.

name: Pandemic
description: A cooperative board game simulating the spread of infectious diseases.

name: Splendor
description: A strategy game where players collect gems and build their gem mines in order to attract wealthy customers.

name: Codenames
description: A party game where players work in teams to identify their secret agents based on one-word clues given by their spymaster.

name: Dominion
description: A deck-building game where players compete to build the best kingdom by acquiring cards with different abilities.

name: Betrayal at Baldur's Gate
description: A cooperative game where players explore a haunted city, working together to uncover the traitor among them.
designer: Chris Dupuis, Mike Mearls, Peter Lee, Rodney Thompson

name: Azul
description: In Azul, players take turns drafting colored tiles from suppliers to their player board. Later in the round, players score points based on how they've placed their tiles to decorate the palace. Extra points are scored for specific patterns and completing sets; wasted supplies harm the player's score. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins.

name: Gloomhaven
description: Gloomhaven is a game of Euro-inspired tactical combat in a persistent world of shifting motives. Players will take on the role of a wandering adventurer with their own special set of skills and their own reasons for traveling to this dark corner of the world. Players must work together out of necessity to clear out menacing dungeons and forgotten ruins. In the process, they will enhance their abilities with experience and loot, discover new locations to explore and plunder, and expand an ever-branching story fueled by the decisions they make.

name: Scythe
description: Scythe is an engine-building game set in an alternate-history 1920s period. It is a time of farming and war, broken hearts and rusted gears, innovation and valor. In Scythe, each player represents a character from one of five factions of Eastern Europa who are attempting to earn their fortune and claim their faction's stake in the land around the mysterious Factory. Players conquer territory, enlist new recruits, reap resources, gain villagers, build structures, and activate monstrous mechs.

name: Terraforming Mars
description: Terraforming Mars is a board game for 1-5 players where players take on the role of corporations working to make Mars habitable. Players use cards to terraform the planet, build cities, and develop technologies.

name: Dixit
description: Dixit is a board game for 3-6 players where players take turns being the storyteller and giving a clue about one of their cards. The other players then choose a card from their hand that they think best matches the clue, and everyone tries to guess which card belonged to the storyteller.

name: 7 Wonders
description: 7 Wonders is a board game for 2-7 players where players build their civilizations and compete to build the most impressive wonders of the world. Each turn, players draft cards from a common pool, and use those cards to build structures, develop technologies, and increase their military might.
